translation.en: [Peter] Uh, please state your name, and who you are.
My name is Dylan Maxwell, and I'm...
I don't know, dude. I'm just Dylan.
translation.ko: 그냥 딜런이지 신분은 또 뭔 소리야?

translation.en: What do you mean, who am I? That's a stupid question.
translation.ko: 그냥 딜런이지 신분은 또 뭔 소리야? - 멍청한 질문이네 - 알았어

translation.en: [Peter] That's okay.
Um... Uh, now, just look at me, and not the camera, please.
Dylan, why am I interviewing you?
translation.ko: 딜런 왜 이 인터뷰를 하는 거야?

translation.en: -Because everyone thinks I did it. -Did what?
The dicks.
[newsman] KOYF3's Erin Caldwell is live on the scene in Oceanside. Erin?
translation.ko: KOYF3의 에린 콜드웰이 현장에 나가 있습니다, 에린?

translation.en: Chris, it is a shocking scene for Hanover High teachers
who left school today only to find their cars vandalized with obscene images.
translation.ko: 누군가 차량에 외설적 그림을 그려놨기 때문이죠

translation.en: It was supposed to be a quiet administrative day at Hanover High.
translation.ko: 오늘 해노버 고교는 행정 업무를 보는 날로

translation.en: A day off for students, teachers took part in a series of mandatory faculty...
-[student 1] Oh, my God, dude. -[student 2] Look what happened at school.
translation.ko: 세상에! 오늘 학교에서 뭔 일이 있었게?

translation.en: They put a big one on my Jeep Wrangler behind me.
translation.ko: 제 지프 랭글러 뒤에도 엄청 크게 그려져 있었어요

translation.en: They got this entire row, as you can see.
All the way back there, they must've made a big loop,
translation.ko: 저 뒤까지 크게 돌면서 거의 모든 차에 그렸더군요

translation.en: -and got pretty much everybody. -[student 3] Holy shit.
translation.ko: 저 뒤까지 크게 돌면서 거의 모든 차에 그렸더군요 대박 사건!

translation.en: -[student 4] Are you getting the head? -[student 3] Yeah.
[Erin] For Principal Janet Regan, this type of mischief is no laughing matter.
translation.ko: 재닛 리건 교장에게 이 장난은 웃을 일이 아니죠

translation.en: I'm sure they thought it was a prank.
But it's destruction of property. We'll find out who did it.
translation.ko: 이것은 심각한 재산 훼손이며 범인을 꼭 잡을 것입니다

translation.en: The vandal spray-painted obscene images on 27 cars
in the staff parking lot, causing an estimated $100,000 in damages.
translation.ko: 범인은 27대의 차량에 외설적 그림을 그렸고 그 피해액은 10만 달러로 추정됩니다

translation.en: As of now, investigators have no leads.
translation.ko: 현재 범인에 대한 단서는 전혀 없습니다

translation.en: Soon as I heard about the dicks, I knew.
translation.ko: 고추 얘기 듣자마자 감이 딱 오던데

translation.en: -This is what Dylan does. -Dylan's a burnout loser.
translation.ko: 딜런이 할 만한 짓이지 맛이 간 놈이잖아 딜런 짓이 뻔해

translation.en: Of course, he did it.
translation.ko: 맛이 간 놈이잖아 딜런 짓이 뻔해

translation.en: [student 5] Dylan Maxwell is the stupidest kid I've ever met.
translation.ko: 내가 아는 사람 중에 딜런 맥스웰이 제일 멍청해

translation.en: He's a fucking idiot.
This is not an isolated incident.
Dylan has a history
-of this kind of behavior. -[woman] Dylan.
translation.ko: 딜런은 이런 행동을 자주 했어요 딜런!

translation.en: -[Shapiro] This administration... -Dylan!
translation.ko: 지금껏 학교는 딜런에게 내릴 수 있는

translation.en: ...has exhausted all other disciplinary options with Dylan.
translation.ko: 지금껏 학교는 딜런에게 내릴 수 있는 징계 조치는 전부 내렸어요

translation.en: For the sake of the other students and their learning environment,
I strongly recommend that you vote to expel Dylan Maxwell
for vandalizing the 27 vehicles.
-[Peter] Do you know who did it? -[Dylan] No.
But, like...
"fuck you" to whoever did.
I mean, seriously.
Like, it's super fucking funny, so, that's all chill, but...
translation.ko: 솔직히 존나 웃기기는 했어 그건 좋은데

translation.en: like, letting me get expelled for something I didn't even do is just...
translation.ko: 하지도 않은 일로 엄한 사람을 퇴학시키면...

translation.en: It's just such a bitch move.
[Peter] Consider for a moment the type of person
translation.ko: 교직원 차량에 고추를 그릴 만한 사람을

translation.en: who would spray-paint dicks on cars in the staff parking lot.
translation.ko: 교직원 차량에 고추를 그릴 만한 사람을 떠올려 보자

translation.en: What do they look like? Who do they hang out with?
translation.ko: 어떻게 생겼지? 누구랑 어울리고 식당의 어디에서 밥을 먹을까?

translation.en: Where do they sit in the cafeteria?
translation.ko: 누구랑 어울리고 식당의 어디에서 밥을 먹을까?

translation.en: What kind of grades do they get?
Is this what you're imagining?
Probably not.
How about her?
Or him? Or her?
It doesn't seem right.
Or are you picturing someone more like this?
Yeah. You're not alone.
The school board thought so, too.
Everyone thinks I did it.
Like, everyone.
Except for my boys and my girl.
Who I was with at the time.
But no one believes us.
[Peter] So, here's what we know.
Tuesday, March 15th, 2016.
It was an admin day, so, no classes were held.
Twenty-seven dicks were spray-painted onto 27 cars in the staff parking lot
translation.ko: 누군가 오션사이드의 해노버 고등학교 주차장에 있던 교직원 차량 27대에 고추를 그려놨다

translation.en: of Hanover High School in Oceanside, California.
[Rothacker] It was horrible.
I had to drive home with a big...
...penis on my car.
The children in the neighborhood saw it.
I'll never understand what's so amusing about penises.
translation.ko: 이해가 안 가 음경이 뭐가 웃긴다는 건지

translation.en: [Peter] The vandalism occurred between two and 2:30.
We know this because the security footage in the parking lot
translation.ko: 어떻게 알았느냐면 그 시각에 주차장을 찍은

translation.en: from that time frame is missing.
Oceanside Police took statements and collected spray paint left
translation.ko: 오션사이드 경찰은 진술을 받았고 주차장 북동쪽에 놓인

translation.en: at the northeast corner of the parking lot.
A criminal hearing for Dylan will likely take place this summer.
translation.ko: 딜런의 공판은 아마 여름에 열릴 것이다

translation.en: It will take the district court months to process charges for felony vandalism,
translation.ko: 지방 법원이 중죄 반달리즘을 처리하는 데는 몇 달이 걸리지만

translation.en: but the school board only needed two weeks to process their decision.
translation.ko: 학교 이사회는 단 2주 만에 결정을 내렸다

translation.en: [Denise sobbing] I'm so sorry.
-[Dylan] I didn't do it, Mom. -I know.
When Dylan does, like, something stupid, and he does stupid things all the time,
translation.ko: 보통 딜런이 멍청한 짓을 저지르면... 뭐, 물론 늘상 있는 일이긴 하지만

translation.en: I mean, he usually will-- He admits it to me. I mean...
I could-- Well, okay, so, he doesn't admit it.
translation.ko: 나는... 그래 인정 안 할 때도 있고 거짓말도 하지만

translation.en: He lies to me a lot. But I can tell when he's lying,
translation.ko: 인정 안 할 때도 있고 거짓말도 하지만 거짓말하면 내가 알아

translation.en: and he knows that I can tell when he's lying,
so, he knows he can't really lie to me,
translation.ko: 내게 거짓말은 안 먹히는 걸 알아

translation.en: because when he looks at me, and he lies, and I ask him a question,
it's like his ears get red on the top, so, I know.
So, I don't think that he did it.
Because...
I just don't.
[Peter] I've personally known Dylan for two years.
We're part of Hanover High School's Morning Show.
translation.ko: 우리 학교 '모닝 쇼'를 함께 제작하기 때문이다

translation.en: Hi. Welcome to the Morning Show.
Today is Wednesday, January 20th, and it is a C day.
My name is Peter Maldonado.
I'm a reporter on the show. He's a cameraman.
Madison with today's menu.
If I'm being honest, I can't say I really like Dylan.
Mostly because he's always doing stuff like this.
...some exciting new additions to the lunch menu.
Today, we have tacos and meatloaf...
[Peter] Disruptive, disrespectful, a history of poor decisions.
You can see why the school board was convinced
translation.ko: 이러니 학교 측에서는 딜런이 고추를 그릴 만하다고 생각하는 거다

translation.en: that Dylan was the type of person to do the dicks.
translation.ko: 딜런이 고추를 그릴 만하다고 생각하는 거다

translation.en: The label fit.
So, all the school board had to do was make their case.
translation.ko: 학교는 딜런이라는 근거를 대기만 하면 됐는데

translation.en: And it's a compelling one. It's damning.
translation.ko: 그 근거가 아주 강하고 설득력 있었다

translation.en: The school structured their case against Dylan using four major points.
translation.ko: 학교 측에선 딜런이 범인이라는 4가지 근거를 제시했다

translation.en: [Hixenbaugh] Can you tell us where you were on the afternoon of March 15th?
Sure. Uh, I'd just come back to pick up some books.
Um, we had a science test next day, I went to grab them from my locker.
translation.ko: "2016년 3월 15일 14시 13분" 다음 날 과학 시험이 있어서 사물함에서 책을 꺼냈죠

translation.en: I came out into the parking lot, and...
...I saw Dylan Maxwell spray-painting the cars.
translation.ko: "알렉스 트림볼리 12학년" 그때 봤죠 딜런 맥스웰이 차에 낙서하고 있었어요

translation.en: You are certain that it's Dylan?
Oh, hundred percent.
[Peter] So, tell me exactly what you saw.
Oh, well, I was coming out of the school over there.
And I kind of noticed something, out of the corner of my eye, so, I turned.
That's where I saw him.
And he just went... Every single car along this row.
Dick.
Dick.
Dick.
Dick.
So, would you say he was frantic about it,
translation.ko: 서두르는 것 같았어? 아니면 느긋해 보였어?

translation.en: -or going kind of slow, at his own pace? -No.
translation.ko: 서두르는 것 같았어? 아니면 느긋해 보였어? 아니

translation.en: He was methodical about it.
That's what was so messed up. Like he had the whole thing planned out.
translation.ko: 미리 계획한 거 같아서 더 끔찍하지

translation.en: There's no way you could've mistaken Dylan for someone else?
translation.ko: 다른 사람을 딜런으로 잘못 본 건 아닐까?

translation.en: You're positive it was Dylan? No, it was... It was definitely Dylan Maxwell.
[Peter] From the day he came forward, Alex Trimboli had one story,
translation.ko: 처음부터 알렉스 트림볼리는 한 가지 이야기로

translation.en: a consistent story.
And it made the school board's case against Dylan clean and simple.
translation.ko: 학교 측은 쉽게 딜런을 추궁할 수 있었다

translation.en: All Dylan had to do was provide a reliable alibi to contradict Alex Trimboli.
Dylan's friends were his best bet.
They call themselves the Wayback Boys.
But when it comes to reliability, they don't exactly fit the bill.
The day after the vandalism,
Vice Principal Keene called in Dylan and his friends for separate interviews
translation.ko: 킨 교감은 딜런과 친구들을 따로 불러서

translation.en: to see if they could keep their story straight.
They couldn't.
[Keene] Okay, great. Have a seat. So, you know why you're here, right?
[Dylan] Yeah, probably 'cause of the dicks.
[Keene] So, where were you yesterday afternoon?
[Dylan] I was at Lucas Wiley's house. We were prank calling his neighbor.
translation.ko: 루커스 와일리 집에서 이웃집에 장난 전화를 했어요

translation.en: -[man] Hello? -Jansen? They're on to you.
You know too much, right? Especially about 9/11.
[Keene] And you were there the whole day?
[Dylan] Pretty much. I left for a bit to go to my girlfriend Mackenzie's house,
translation.ko: 그렇죠 여자친구인 매켄지 집에 들른 거 빼고요

translation.en: but other than that, yeah.
translation.ko: 여자친구인 매켄지 집에 들른 거 빼고요

translation.en: [Keene] Well, that's not what your friends said.
[Dylan] What did they say?
[Keene] So, where were you yesterday afternoon?
[Spencer] I was at Lucas Wiley's house. We were making prank calls.
translation.ko: 루커스 와일리 집에서 장난 전화 했어요

translation.en: [Keene] And where was Dylan Maxwell?
[Spencer] He was there with us.
-[Keene] The whole day? -[Spencer] Yeah.
translation.ko: 종일? 네, 프라이스리스 모먼츠에 똥 누러 갔을 때 빼고요

translation.en: I mean, he left for a little bit to go to Priceless Moments to take a dump.
translation.ko: 네, 프라이스리스 모먼츠에 똥 누러 갔을 때 빼고요

translation.en: [Keene] So, Dylan left?
translation.ko: "오전 11시 48분 루커스 와일리 심문" 딜런이 자리를 비웠니?

translation.en: [Lucas] Yeah. He shits at Priceless Moments.
It's this antique store down the street from my house.
He doesn't like my bathroom. My mom has one of those squishy seats.
translation.ko: 우리 집 화장실이 싫대요 변기 커버가 푹신하거든요

translation.en: [Spencer] Dylan says the squishy toilet seats are like pressing your butt
translation.ko: 딜런은 변기가 푹신하면 꼭 다른 사람 엉덩이에 앉아서

translation.en: against someone else's butt, and then pooping into their butthole.
translation.ko: 꼭 다른 사람 엉덩이에 앉아서 그 사람 똥구멍에 싸는 거 같대요

translation.en: [Keene] Okay, okay.
[Hixenbaugh] Mackenzie, on the afternoon of March 15th,
translation.ko: "2주 후 매켄지 와그너 증언" 매켄지 3월 15일 오후에

translation.en: do you remember where Dylan was?
Yeah, he was, uh, hanging over at Lucas Wiley's,
and then he came and dropped off dog food at my place.
translation.ko: 저희 집에 개 사료를 갖다 주러 왔어요

translation.en: Great. Do you remember about what time he came to drop off the dog food?
Um, like two-ish, 2:10, 2:15.
Okay. Well, sometime-- Would you say sometime between two and 2:30?
-Yeah. -Okay, great.
Um, do you have any proof that he was there?
I saw him.
Okay. Um...
[Peter] But if Dylan's friends all agree on Priceless Moments,
translation.ko: 딜런의 친구들은 모두 화장실 얘기를 했는데

translation.en: why doesn't his girlfriend?
I saw him.
-You saw him. -Yes.
[Hixenbaugh] You say he's at your house.
His friends say he's at an antique store.
And then we have vandalism at the high school.
All in the same 30-minute period.
So, let's see if we can try and sort, uh, some of this out.
All right. What I have right now is purple for theories and yellow for facts.
[Peter] This is my good friend and co-producer, Sam Ecklund.
translation.ko: 나랑 친한 친구이자 공동 제작자인 샘 에클런드다

translation.en: He's really into string.
What bothers me are these conflicting testimonies.
Dylan and Mackenzie both say that Dylan was at Mackenzie's house.
translation.ko: 매켄지 집에 있었다고 딜런이랑 매켄지가 말하는데

translation.en: The Wayback Boys said he went to Priceless Moments to take a dump.
translation.ko: 웨이백 보이즈는 골동품 가게로 갔다고 하지

translation.en: He wasn't-- Look. He was lying about both.
translation.ko: 아니... 둘 다 거짓이야 딜런은 고추 그리고 있었으니까

translation.en: He wasn't at either. He was drawing the dicks.
translation.ko: 둘 다 거짓이야 딜런은 고추 그리고 있었으니까

translation.en: [Peter] If Dylan, his girlfriend, and the Wayback Boys are all lying,
as Sam believes,
then we have a narrative that's easy to digest.
He wasn't at Mackenzie's house or taking a dump at Priceless Moments.
translation.ko: 매켄지의 집에 가지도 골동품 가게에서 볼일을 보지도 않았고

translation.en: Instead, he was at Hanover High School,
and more specifically, the parking lot of Hanover High School,
to draw the dicks, as Alex Trimboli claims.
translation.ko: 알렉스 트림볼리 말대로 고추 그림을 그린 거다

translation.en: Even if they had gotten their story straight,
it's not easy to trust Dylan and his friends.
[Duncan] They call themselves the Wayback Boys.
So fucking dumb.
-Those guys are idiots. -Again.
-[girl] Let's see. -Do it again. [grunts]
I don't know what they said, but Dylan did it.
[Peter] The key to this whole thing is in these conflicting testimonies.
You either trust Alex Trimboli from the National Honor Society,
translation.ko: 명예 학생 단체에 속해있는 알렉스 트림볼리를 믿거나

translation.en: or you trust Dylan and his friends,
creators of the YouTube video, Porta Potty Shit Prank.
translation.ko: 유튜브에 '이동식 화장실 골탕 먹이기'를 올린 일당이지

translation.en: [Peter] So, what's your opinion on Alex Trimboli?
translation.ko: "이동식 화장실 골탕 먹이기" 알렉스 트림볼리를 어떻게 생각해?

translation.en: Fuck Alex Trimboli.
[Lucas] Come on, dude.
There was one of him saying he was there, and four of us saying he wasn't.
translation.ko: 딜런이 거기 있었다는 건 한 명이고 아니라는 건 우리 넷이잖아

translation.en: [Peter] Okay, if Dylan cheated on a test in school...
translation.ko: 그래 만약 딜런이 학교 시험에서 부정행위를 했고

translation.en: ...and, um, this teacher was suspicious of-- That somebody had cheated,
would you lie and say that Dylan did not cheat?
Yeah.
Dude, don't say that.
That doesn't help.
What?
-Say no. Say no. -Well, I mean, I ain't know that, what?
translation.ko: - 내가 쥐새끼냐? - 취소해 - 왜? - 나도 그럴 거야

translation.en: I would also say, yeah.
-I also feel-- -But that's different.
-School is different than-- -Yeah.
Like, I was with this dude.
This is 100-percent. He was here.
[Peter] Remember I said parking lot security footage
translation.ko: "하나, 엇갈린 진술 둘, 접근 권한" 주차장 보안 카메라 영상이 없어졌단 거 기억해?

translation.en: at the time of the vandalism was missing?
translation.ko: 주차장 보안 카메라 영상이 없어졌단 거 기억해?

translation.en: This was the school board's second key point against Dylan.
translation.ko: 그게 학교 측에서 딜런을 범인으로 모는 2번째 근거다

translation.en: Because he was one of the nine students who had access to the footage.
translation.ko: 영상에 접근할 수 있는 9명 중 하나였으니까

translation.en: The media server stores the footage for the Morning Show in one directory...
translation.ko: 미디어 서버의 한 디렉터리엔 '모닝 쇼' 영상이

translation.en: ...and the security footage in the other.
Okay. Awesome. And...
you know, which students of yours had access
translation.ko: 그렇다면 미디어 서버실에 접근 권한이 있는 학생은 누구죠?

translation.en: to the media server room where that's held?
Uh... Nine students:
Uh, Randall Snyder,
Sam Ecklund,
Emily Hershey,
Phil Huang,
Christa Carlyle,
Ming Zhang,
Peter Maldonado,
Madison Kaplan, and Dylan Maxwell.
[Peter] Dylan often tells me, the vandal could be anyone.
translation.ko: 딜런은 누구나 기물 파괴범일 수 있다 했지만

translation.en: But that's not entirely true.
Sure, anyone could spray-paint dicks,
translation.ko: 물론 누구나 고추를 그릴 수 있지만

translation.en: but deleting security footage from the school's private server?
translation.ko: 학교 서버에서 보안 영상을 지울 수 있는 사람은

translation.en: There's only a short list of people capable of that.
Nine people who could've done it,
or at the very least, helped the person who did.
Since the vandalism,
I've started referring to them as the Morning Show Nine.

but she just makes me feel...
different.
It's kind of weird to say, I guess, but...
I think I love her.
It's just like a crazy thing to say.
But, I mean, obviously, there's other girls...
that are really hot, and have nice bodies or whatever.
But... I don't know, man.
The way Mackenzie makes me feel is just...
It just-- No other girl can... make me feel like that.
translation.ko: 기분이... 다른 여자랑 있을 때랑 전혀 다른 기분이야

translation.en: And she also has, like, a way better ass.
Mac, look, look.
Oh, my God, you're gonna break his neck.
-I'm sorry. -[Mackenzie shrieks]
-[Dylan] Ruff. -[Peter] If we could prove that you were here
translation.ko: 네가 주차장이 아니라 여기 있었단 걸 증명하면

translation.en: instead of the school parking lot, we prove Alex Trimboli is lying.
translation.ko: 네가 주차장이 아니라 여기 있었단 걸 증명하면 알렉스 트림볼리의 거짓을 밝힐 수 있어

translation.en: Yeah, but, like, how do we prove that, you know?
I already told them to go through my phone, and...
I was like, "Yo, do some CSI-type stuff, you know?
Track me, you'll be able to see that I was here,
and I wasn't, you know, in the parking lot."
translation.ko: 여기 있었단 걸 알 수 있을 거랬는데

translation.en: But they said...
I don't know, they said they don't have the technology.
[Peter] Which is actually accurate.
Even when the police get involved,
cell phone records can only put Dylan in a particular location
if he made or received a phone call.
But he didn't.
[Mackenzie] Ruff was here.
Ruff was here. Yo, Ruff, tell them.
translation.ko: 러프가 있었지 러프, 말 좀 해봐

translation.en: -He knows I'm innocent. Listen to him. -[Ruff whimpering]
He knows.
Yeah. That's him saying, "Don't do this to Dylan."
-[Mackenzie] "Don't do this to Dylan." -"Don't do this to Dylan. He's innocent."
[Dylan] Like, at first, I didn't... I mean, I didn't even think being expelled was gonna be that bad.
translation.ko: 처음엔 퇴학도 그리 나쁠 것 같지 않았어

translation.en: Like, I was almost-- I was kind of excited.
I thought I was gonna be able to, like...
just kick it, and go get smoothies, and skate.
translation.ko: 스무디 마시고 스케이트 타며 지낼 줄 알았거든

translation.en: You know, honestly, it's just...
Now that everyone's at school, and I'm just here...
translation.ko: 모두 학교에 가고 나만... 여기 있으니까

translation.en: it's actually kind of lonely.
I gotta work this shit job for half the day.
translation.ko: 반나절을 구린 일을 하며 보내야 하고

translation.en: The only thing on TV is, like...
Ellen...
Wendy, Tyra...
all those fucking first-name shows.
Maury.
It's just not the way I thought things were gonna go.
You know, I was gonna graduate high school...
go to Boulder with Mackenzie in the fall, get my degree in, like...
translation.ko: 가을에 매켄지랑 볼더에 가서 학위를 따려 했지

translation.en: engineering or some shit, and then move up north, work at a snowboard shop.
translation.ko: 공학 같은 거로, 그리고 스노보드 숍에서 일하려 했어

translation.en: I mean, at this point, best-case scenario is
translation.ko: 근데 지금은... 매켄지랑 장거리 연애하는 게 최선이야

translation.en: me and Mackenzie do long-distance.
But, I mean, that basically just means I have to jerk myself off... every night.
translation.ko: 그 말인즉슨 매일 밤 딸딸이나 쳐야 하는 거지

translation.en: I mean, honestly, she'd probably just break up with me.
So, I would still have to jerk myself off every night.
Either way, I'm gonna have to jerk off myself.
I mean, I guess the worst part of this whole thing
is just the fact that, like...
I know I didn't do it.
You know? Like, I didn't fucking do it.
But everyone is talking about me like I did.
Like, everyone.
And I'm not even there, you know?
I can't even, like, defend myself.
Dylan Maxwell, no question.
[student] He's, like, a known dick drawer.
Ball hairs? Who cares?
Parking lot dicks could have two nutsacks and warts,
and... it doesn't even matter.
I don't think he was even gonna graduate. Who gives a shit about Dylan Maxwell?
translation.ko: 어차피 졸업 생각 없었을걸 걔를 누가 신경 써?

translation.en: Yeah, I wouldn't trust anything that Dylan says.
translation.ko: 딜런이 하는 말은 전부 믿지 마

translation.en: But then again, I wouldn't trust anything that Alex Trimboli says, either.
[Peter] Why not?
For starters, he said he got to third base with Sara Pearson at summer camp.
translation.ko: 여름 캠프 때 새라 피어슨이랑 3루까지 갔다잖아

translation.en: [Peter] Wait, what?
As you can tell from my reaction, this news is a little bit shocking.
translation.ko: "잘 자" 내 반응으로 눈치챘겠지만 충격적인 사실이다

translation.en: Alex Trimboli claims he got a hand job from Sara Pearson?
translation.ko: 새라 피어슨이 대딸 해줬다고 알렉스가 말했다니

translation.en: Sara Pearson has hooked up with Michael Polowski,
translation.ko: 새라 피어슨이 만난 남자는 마이클 폴라우스키

translation.en: Brad Cormack, Scott Winter.
And then she hooks up with Alex Trimboli?
Sara Pearson? Like, no way, dude.
Have you seen Alex? And have you seen Sara?
There is no way Alex got a hand job from Sara.
translation.ko: 새라가 알렉스를 손으로 해주다니 말도 안 돼

translation.en: She's... kind of top-notch.
Sara Pearson is so hot.
She used to date Scott Winter.
Scott... Sara.
-Alex. -No.
Alex.
[Peter] With only circumstantial evidence tying him to the vandalism,
the school board built its entire case against Dylan
translation.ko: 학교 측은 알렉스 트림볼리의 증언만 믿고

translation.en: on the back of Alex Trimboli's eyewitness testimony.
Yes, they had his whiteboard dicks, Shapiro's tire,
translation.ko: 물론 칠판의 고추 그림과 샤피로 선생님의 타이어와 미디어 서버도 있었지만

translation.en: and the media server, but Trimboli was their star.
translation.ko: 샤피로 선생님의 타이어와 미디어 서버도 있었지만 트림볼리가 구세주였다

translation.en: While Dylan spends his days delivering diapers and french fries,
robbed of his senior year, and potentially college,
translation.ko: 12학년 시절과 대학에 대한 꿈을 빼앗긴 반면

translation.en: Trimboli walks the halls like a hero.
But what if we can't trust him?
What if he's not as reliable as the school board would have you to believe?
translation.ko: 학교 측의 생각만큼 믿을 만한 사람이 아니라면?

translation.en: What if he's a liar?
[Peter] So, Alex, tell me.
Did you get a hand job from Sara Pearson?
